name: Yummy Grilled Asparagus
author: Celeste
summary: I created this last summer. It goes great with all grilled meats and fish.
ingredients: ⅓ cup Italian-style dressing (such as Bernstein's Restaurant Recipe®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Lay asparagus flat in a 9x9-inch pan
Add Italian dressing, lemon pepper, salt, and black pepper; toss to coat
Transfer asparagus using tongs to the grill
Grill asparagus on preheated grill until tender, 3 to 5 minutes per side
Return asparagus to pan and toss with remaining dressing mixture
